member.name: IApplicationAssociationRegistration.ClearUserAssociations
member.summary: Removes all per-user associations for the current user. This results in a reversion to machine defaults, if they exist. Not intended for use in Windows 8.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationAssociationRegistration.QueryAppIsDefault
member.summary: Determines whether an application owns the registered default association for a given application level and type. Not intended for use in Windows 8.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the file name extension or protocol of the application, such as .mp3 or http.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of the application named in pszQuery, such as file name extension or MIME type.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of association, such as per-user or machine. This is typically .
A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that specifies the registered name of the application.
When this method returns, contains TRUE if the application is the default; or FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationAssociationRegistration.QueryAppIsDefaultAll
member.summary: Determines whether an application owns all of the registered default associations for a given application level. Not intended for use in Windows 8.
member.param: One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of association, such as per-user or machine. This is typically .
A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that specifies the registered name of the application.
When this method returns, contains TRUE if the application is the default for all at the specified ; or FALSE otherwise.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationAssociationRegistration.QueryCurrentDefault
member.summary: Determines the default application for a given association type. This is the default application launched by for that type.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated, Unicode string that contains the file name extension or protocol, such as .mp3 or http.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of association, such as extension or MIME type.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the level of association, such as per-user or machine. This is typically .

param.name: ppszAssociation
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the ProgID that identifies the current default association.
param.div: Note It is the responsibility of the calling application to release the string through .

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationAssociationRegistration.SetAppAsDefault
member.summary: Sets an application as the default for a given extension or protocol, provided that the application's publisher matches the current default's. For more information, see Default Programs. Not intended for use in Windows 8.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that specifies the application's ProgID.
A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the file name extension or protocol of the application, such as .mp3 or http.
One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of the application named in extOrUriScheme, such as file name extension or MIME type.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. In particular, if the application's publisher doesn't match the default's, this method returns E_ACCESSDENIED.

member.name: IApplicationAssociationRegistration.SetAppAsDefaultAll
member.summary: Sets an application as the default for all of the registered associations of any for that application. Not intended for use in Windows 8.
member.param: A pointer to a null-terminated Unicode string that specifies the registered name of the application.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that query and set default applications for specific file , and protocols at a specific .
summary.div: Note As of Windows 8, the only functionality of this interface that is supported is .
